ygData.subject: Dragons Made Tougher
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello, I am writing to comment on the way that Verant has made each of the dragons tougher to fight now. On Thursday mornings patch, Verant gave Nag and Vox a
ygData.messageBody:
Hello, I am writing to comment on the way that Verant has made each
of the dragons tougher to fight now. On Thursday mornings patch, Verant gave
Nag and Vox a new ability to AE Dispel Magic. I am a Level 50 Bard by the
name of Downs on Tribunal, my guild The Elitists and our Sister guild The
Vagrants attempted to kill both dragons after the patch. Well, Lady Vox fell
fine but after a failed attempt at Lord Nag we had some key members in need
of sleep due to it being a weekday (yes, we got started a little late in the
evening).

I was just commenting on this fact so that others know what to
expect now when fighting these dragons, most everyone in our raiding party
had all of their buffs stripped away. I also noticed that guardian rhythms
and elemental rhythms was being stripped by Nag and Vix nearly as fast as I
could refresh them. It is seems these two are quite a bit more difficult
now.

Downs DePunisher
50 Wood-elf Bard
The Elitists Tribunal Server.
